ai.grakn.concept

Interface Instance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Concept>, Concept
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Entity, Relation, Resource<D>, Rule

    public interface Instance
extends Concept

    A data instance in the graph belonging to a specific Type

    Instances represent data in the graph. Every instance belongs to a Type which serves as a way of categorising them. Instances can relate to one another via Relation

    Author:
    fppt
    See Also:
    Entity, Relation, Resource, Rule

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<RoleType> plays()
      Determine the Role Types that this Instance may play.
      Collection<Relation> relations(RoleType... roleTypes)
      Retrieves a Relations which the Instance takes part in, which may optionally be narrowed to a particular set according to the RoleType you are interested in.
      Instance resource(Resource resource)
      Creates a relation from this instance to the provided resource.
      Collection<Resource<?>> resources(ResourceType... resourceTypes)
      Retrieves a collection of Resources attached to this Instances
      Type type()
      Return the Type of the Concept.

      • Methods inherited from interface ai.grakn.concept.Concept

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • type

        Type type()
        Return the Type of the Concept.
        Returns:
        A Type which is the type of this concept. This concept is an instance of that type.

      • relations

        Collection<Relation> relations(RoleType... roleTypes)
        Retrieves a Relations which the Instance takes part in, which may optionally be narrowed to a particular set according to the RoleType you are interested in.
        Parameters:
        roleTypes - An optional parameter which allows you to specify the role of the relations you wish to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A set of Relations which the concept instance takes part in, optionally constrained by the Role Type.
        See Also:
        RoleType, Relation

      • plays

        Collection<RoleType> plays()
        Determine the Role Types that this Instance may play.
        Returns:
        A set of all the Role Types which this instance plays.
        See Also:
        RoleType

      • resource

        Instance resource(Resource resource)
        Creates a relation from this instance to the provided resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to which a relationship is created
        Returns:
        The instance itself

      • resources

        Collection<Resource<?>> resources(ResourceType... resourceTypes)
        Retrieves a collection of Resources attached to this Instances
        Parameters:
        resourceTypes - Resource Types of the resources attached to this entity
        Returns:
        A collection of resources attached to this Instance.
        See Also:
        Resource
